name: blessed-core
description: tput and program extracted from from blessed

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p ./tsconfigDeclarations.json && rm -rf dist/src/declarations && cp -r src/declarations dist/src && echo 'build successful'
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.browserify: rm -rf dist build && npm run build && mkdir -p build && npx browserify dist/test/programTest.js -o build/programTest.js && npx terser build/programTest.js -o build/programTest.js

author: Sebastian Gurin
